verses.text: Mamin Jehová, tzach in b'itej yet' in wach' lolonel, yujto ix in a sik'k'e waan t'a skal in niwan yaelal, maj in a cha b'uchjoc yuj heb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin.
Mamin, in Diosal ach, ix in k'an a colwal, ix ak'an b'oxoc in k'ool.
Mamin, a ach ton ix in a colel t'a chamel. Ix ak' in k 'inal, maj in a chab'atlaj t'a skal heb' chamnac.
B'itananhec t'a Jehová, mach ex to schonhab' ex, b'itejec yujto anhej Te Niwan Yelk'ochi.
Yujto junnhej rato ay yowal sk'ool, haxo swach'k'olal aynhejek' t'a masanil tiempo. Wach'chom tzonh ok' t'ak'walil, haxo yic sq'uinhib'i sja ko tzalajk'olal.
Ayic te wach' waji, ix in na' icha tik: Malaj b'ak'uinh ol in telwoc yuj junok tas, xin chi.
Mamin Jehová, yuj wal swach'il a k'ool, ix in ak'kanoch b'aj malaj tas tzin ik'ani. Palta ayic ix ik'anel a b'a t'ayin, ix somchajkanel in k'ool.
Mamin, ix ach wavtej, ix walan in b'a t'ayach:

¿Tasto a ganar t'ayin, q'uinaloc tato tzin chami, tzin mucchaji? Manhxo ol yal-laj ach sb'itan heb' toxo ix och pokokal. Manh ol yal pax laj yalan wach' lolonel heb' t'ayach yuj swach'il tas ix a b'o'o, xin chi.
Mamin Jehová, ab' wal tas swala', ok'oc wal a k'ool t'ayin. Mamin, ochannhej wed'oc.
Ix ak'an k'exmaj in yaelal t'a tzalajk'olal. Ix ik'anel in cusk'olal, ix ak'ankanoch k'apac pichul yic q'uinh in pichuloc.
Yuj wal chi' jun, ach Jehová in Diosal, max yal-laj wem numan. Tzin b'itan t'ayach t'a aloj wach' lolonel yet' ak'oj yuj diosal t'ayach t'a masanil tiempo.
